actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the payroll tax relief under the HIRE Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: HIRE Now Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend until January 1, 2012, the exemption from payment of employment taxes for individuals who begin employment after December 31, 2010.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the payroll tax relief under the HIRE Act, and for other purposes.
